metadata.name: LOVE Etiam
metadata.description:
"LOVE Etiam" by Sawdust

This piece derives from a prior short film of ours named 'LOVE', which explores the polarity between a strong outer appearance and fragility.

'LOVE Etiam' is our follow up piece, (Etiam; 'Still', 'Even Now' in Latin), demonstrating the endurance of love in a never ending loop. Love still remains.

—

About CYBERPUNK VOL. 1

The CYBERPUNK VOL. 1 collection is the world's first gathering of cyberpunk NFT artists in a group show. Curated by Random Ghost, who has been featuring the best of what cyberpunk should be since 2011, this collection is a celebration of the dark, gritty streets of our tomorrow and of some of the most exciting artists continuing to evolve the genre while keeping cyber punk.

Conceived and produced by SuperchiefGalleryNFT
